name: Alisha Khan
greetingText: Aap ka naam utna hi khoobsurat hai jitni aap khud hain! ✨
wishText: Dua hai ke aap ki zindagi hamesha khushiyon, kamiyabi, aur pyari yaadon se bhari rahe! 🎉
text1: Aaj aap ka khaas din hai!!! 🥳
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday, Alisha Khan! Aap ki zindagi hamesha mohabbat, muskurahat aur khushiyon se roshan rahe! 🎂🎈
text2: Main bas ek chhoti si dua bhejne wala tha...
text3: Magar phir socha, aap ke liye kuch khaas hona chahiye!
text4: Mujhe mehsoos hua, ye din aur bhi zyada
text5Content: Aap waqai ek behtareen shakhsiyat hain! 🌟
outroText: Ab apna ye khaas din khub enjoy karein aur khoobsurat yaadein banayein! 🎁
replayText: Ya phir yahan click karein agar is khoobsurat pal ko phir mehsoos karna chahti hain! 💫
